alerts.message:
...A Severe Thunderstorm Warning remains in effect until 415 PM CDT
for Wayne County...

At 349 PM CDT...a severe thunderstorm was located near Cisne...or 7
miles northwest of Fairfield...moving east at 30 mph. Numerous
reports of ping pong to Golf Ball sized hail in and around Fairfield
have occurred with this storm.

Hazard...Golf Ball size hail and 60 mph wind gusts. 

Source...radar indicated. 

Impact...people and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect hail 
 damage to roofs...siding...windows...and vehicles. Expect wind 
 damage to roofs...siding...and trees. 

Locations impacted include...
Fairfield...Wayne City...Cisne...Jeffersonville...Sims...Mill Shoals...
Mount Erie...Keenes...Johnsonville and Golden Gate.

Precautionary/preparedness actions...

For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a
building.


Lat...Lon 3860 8815 3826 8815 3826 8870 3861 8869
time...Mot...loc 2049z 250deg 35kt 3846 8846 

Hail...1.75in
wind...60mph

Severe Thunderstorm Watch 167 remains in effect until 700 PM CDT
for the following locations


IL 
. Illinois counties included are

Bond Champaign Christian 
Clark Clay Clinton 
Coles Crawford Cumberland 
De Witt Douglas Edgar 
Edwards Effingham Fayette 
Franklin Hamilton Jasper 
Jefferson Jersey Lawrence 
Macon Macoupin Madison 
Marion Monroe Montgomery 
Moultrie Perry Piatt
